translations: n．访客，来访者：到某人家中拜访的人。
· We had several callers at our house yesterday.
昨天我们家里来了几位访客。

sentences.sentence: Hundreds of callers jammed the switchboard for more than an hour.
sentences.translation: 上百个来电者堵塞了总机一个多小时。

sentences.sentence: She ushered her callers into a cluttered living room.
sentences.translation: 她把来客们带到一间杂乱的客厅。

sentences.sentence: Callers dialling the wrong area code will not get through.
sentences.translation: 打电话的人拨错区号时电话就接不通。
